front: Q1. Which of these will NOT stretch geometry if you click it with the Move tool and move your cursor outward? - a group - and edge - an endpoint - a face
Q2. What is needed to use the Follow Me tool? - a continuous path of edges - a correctly oriented face - the Push/Pull tool - the Offset and Move tools

Q3. What does dragging a selection windows arround entities from left to right do? - It deselect any preselect items. - It causes selected entities to turn from blue to yellow. - It selects entities that are entirely contained in the selection box. - It selects anything the selection touch box.
back: It selects entities that are entirely contained in the selection box.

front: Q4. What do layers control? - Visibility - Grouping - Stacking groups - Separating entities.
Q5. What action is demonstrated in this image? - inference - push - pull - offset
6. Which action keeps two edges from "Stacking" together? - grouping - intersection - avoiding edges touch - drawing perpendicular

Q7. In LayOut, how can you set the default lenght of dimension leader lines? - [ ] - [ ] - [ ] - 1.Create a dimension and click and drag each leader line to your desire length with the select-tool. 2. Right-click the leader line and select Copy. 3. Continue to draw subsequence dimension with the new leader line length applied.
back: 1.Create a dimension and click and drag each leader line to your desire length with the select-tool. 2. Right-click the leader line and select Copy. 3. Continue to draw subsequence dimension with the new leader line length applied.

front: Q8. Which tool allows you to scale an edge to a new size that you specify by the typing in the desired measurement? - Right-Click - Protractor - Type measurement - Scale

Q9. How do you round off and trim a corner with only a 2 Point arc tool? - 2.Double click and adjacent edge where it says tangent to edge while inference color is magenta. - 2.Right click and select trim. - you cannot do this only with 2 point arc tool - [ ]
back: 2.Double click and adjacent edge where it says tangent to edge while inference color is magenta.

front: Q10. What is the best way to click in the measurement box? - to start a new measurement - when you would like to edit a measurement - there is never - to delete a measurement

front: Q12. The drawing on the left has hidden line style... - [ ] - [ ] - [ ] - In the Style Window, select the edit tab, click The Edges icon and select the back edge option.
back: In the Style Window, select the edit tab, click The Edges icon and select the back edge option.

front: Q13. Which arrow key allows you to toggle between parallel and perpendicular (magenta) inference direction? - Left - Down Arrow - Right - Up
Q14. How can you check the lenght of an edge? - Use the selct tool - Righr click on an edge - Use the tape measurement tool to click... - Use the tape measurement tool to hover over...
back: Use the tape measurement tool to hover over...
